Original meaning 本义: Meaning false.

English senses 英语理解: false, counterfeit, bogus

僞字的基本解释

僞
wěi
同“伪”。

僞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》危睡切，去寘，疑。］
亦作“偽1”。“伪1”的繁体字。
(1)人为。
(2)奸伪；欺诈。
(3)伪装；假装。
(4)虚伪；虚假。
(5)僭伪。指非法的政权。
(6)通“帷”。
(7)通“爲”（wéi）。实行。
(8)通“爲”（wèi）。替。
[②]［é］
［《集韻》吾禾切，平戈，疑。］
亦作“偽2”。“伪2”的繁体字。
(1)通“訛”。改变；变化。
(2)通“訛”。错误；差错。参见“僞2謬”。
(3)通“吪”。动。
[③]［guì］
［《集韻》居僞切，去寘，見。］
亦作“偽3”。“伪3”的繁体字。
钱币。

僞字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僞； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页117第02
【唐韻】【集韻】?危睡切，危去聲。【說文】詐也。【周禮·地官】大司徒之職，以五禮防萬民之僞，而敎之中。【書·周官】作僞心勞日拙。【左傳·襄三十年】淑愼爾止，無載爾僞。　又位悲切，讀作帷。【禮·喪大記】素錦褚，加僞荒。　又【集韻】【正韻】?與訛同。【周禮·春官·馮相氏註】中夏，辨秩南僞。【前漢·王莽傳】以勸南僞。【註】韋昭讀。【正字通】書堯典本作南訛，周禮註及漢書誤从僞。轉註古音謂吪假借作僞，泥。　【說文】从人，爲聲。【徐曰】僞者人爲之，非天眞也，故人爲爲僞。

考證：〔【周禮·夏官·馮相氏註】中夏，辨秩南僞。〕　謹照原書夏官改春官。

Basic explanation of words
False
wěi
Same as "pseudo".
False
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" sleeps in danger, go to question, doubt. ]
Also known as "pseudo 1". "False 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Artificial.
(2) Fake; fraud.
(3) Disguise; pretend.
(4) Hypocrisy; false.
(5) Falsehood. Refers to an illegal regime.
(6) Through "curtain".
(7) Tong "为" (wéi). Implement.
(8) Through "为" (wèi). for.
[②] [é]
["Ji Yun" Wu He cut, Ping Ge, doubt. ]
Also known as "pseudo 2". "False 2" in traditional characters.
(1) Through "corruption". Change; change.
(2) Through "corrupt". Error; error. See "Pseudo 2 Fallacy".
(3) Through "吪". move.
[③]［guì］
["Jiyun" is a pseudo-cut, go and set, see. ]
Also known as "pseudo-3". "False 3" in traditional characters.
coin.
False
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　False; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 117 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Dangerous sleep cut, Dangerous sound. [Said the text] Fraud. [Zhou Li·Guan Guan] The post of the great Situ, to guard against the hypocrisy of the people with five rituals, and be in the midst of it. [Book·Zhou Guan] It is hard to perceive falsehood. [Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang] Shu Mingerzhi, no falsehood.　A bit sad again, read as a curtain. 【Ritual·Mourning Record】Su Jin Chu, adding falsehood.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Same as error. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Feng Xiangshi's Note】Zhong Xia, distinguish the southern pseudo-rank. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] To persuade the Southern Puppet. [Note] Wei Zhao reads. [Zhengzitong] The book Yaodian was written as Nanzheng, and Zhou Li's notes and Han books were mistakenly followed by false ones. Transferring the ancient accent that 吪 is a fake, mud.　【Speaking】From the person to the sound. [Xu Yue] The hypocrites are artificial, not natural, so artificial is hypocritical. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Feng Xiangshi's Note] Zhongxia, distinguishing the South Puppet. 〕　I would like to change the original book Xia Guan to Chun Guan.
